title: The Future Of | A new series from Netflix + The Verge
description: What if we could look into the future and see how technology will change everything; from raising pets and houseplants, to how we dress, eat, date, and even how we die. We made a Netflix show to explore these ideas.  In our new docuseries, The Future Of, we look at how innovative technologies will change our everyday lives hundreds of years from now.   Premiering on Netflix on June 21st.
